about_the_game:
Dynasty's Defender: The Scroll's Curse is a strategic bubble shooter game set in the Western Han Dynasty of China. In this game, you play as the great general Wei Qing, battling an assassin who intends to murder the emperor.

Game Features:


  • Magical Scroll Mechanism: The assassin possesses a special magical scroll whose released energy transforms into colorful bubbles. These bubbles float above the unfolded scroll, forming a barrier between Wei Qing and the assassin.
  • Bubble Shooting: Control the direction of the shooter to fire bubbles of different colors. When three or more bubbles of the same color connect, they explode, gradually weakening the power of the scroll. Once all bubbles are destroyed, the scroll closes, and Wei Qing's arrow can bypass the scroll to strike the assassin.
  • Dagger Stone Plate: Enhance your gameplay with the Dagger Stone Plate, a power-up generated and upgraded by consecutively bursting bubbles. Skillful management of this power-up can dramatically simplify gameplay challenges, providing a distinct advantage in overcoming difficult levels.
  • Multi-Level Challenges: The game offers various difficulty levels—easy, medium, hard, and expert. Each level of difficulty has multiple stages that need to be completed to defeat the assassin. The higher the difficulty level, the more levels and the greater the challenge in the final levels, resulting in significantly higher final scores.
  • Immersive Experience: The game includes traditional Chinese music and combines historical and cultural elements to provide a deep immersion for players from diverse cultural backgrounds.
  • Interface and Settings: The game supports multiple languages and allows players to choose their screen mode, including switching between fullscreen, borderless, and windowed modes. Additionally, players can adjust the difficulty level according to their proficiency, and the game score is displayed in real time on the screen, refreshing after each level to provide immediate gameplay feedback.
